Package com.quantimodo.tools.sync

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SyncHelper
    Helper class to control sync Create/updates/deletes pending intents for AlarmManager By default sync invoked once per 12 hours SyncReceiver should be added to AndroidManifest.xml file, in order to use this helper
    SyncReceiver
    Used to invoke sync process, in IntentService with WakeLock Must be added to AndroidManifest.xml file
    SyncService
    Helps user to sync data with QuantimodoService This service should be invoked by SyncHelper
